page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: To find our information,we interviewed people from Raby Hall,pupils in school and adults at the local shops. Most people like their hair short,and wear trainers and jeans.Casual wear is favoured by most adults,but older men wear suits most of the time.Most younger people like pop music,and older people like the clasics.The favourite singers now are Duran Duran and Paul Young. Most young people like fast food,but middle-aged people prefer salads and roast meats,as do the elderly.Videos and computers are in young families along with a car,while the elderly will read more. { Raby Hall}is a residential home for autistics over eighteen.The people there do craft,woodwork,pottery and cookery.
